title: CamPAIN, Spenser Confidential > Empire Strikes Back 7.17.20
itunes:title: CamPAIN, Spenser Confidential > Empire Strikes Back 7.17.20
description:
In episode 674, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Blake Wexler to discuss Trump demoting Brad Parscale, poll numbers for the 2020 election, Chuck Woolery deleting his account, masks being our savior, Trump administration covering up coronavirus information, Netflix top original films, what we're watching for Tuesday, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Trump shakes up campaign leadership as he struggles in latest polls
  2. The Trump campaign has a new effort to rebut his lousy poll numbers. It’s not good.
  3. Power Up: Trump is touting an enthusiasm gap with Biden. But his campaign may be looking at the numbers the wrong way.
  4. Brad Parscale is wrong. The campaign probably can’t save Trump.
  5. Nationscape: A comprehensive view of the American electorate
  6. Game show host retweeted by Trump deletes his account after announcing his son has coronavirus
  7. Here's Your Sign
  8. COVID-19 could be controlled in 1-2 months if people wear masks: CDC Director Robert Redfield
  9. Georgia governor overrides all local mask orders in the state
  10. Trump administration accused of covering up COVID-19 hospitalizations after current data VANISHES from CDC site despite director's claim the agency's access to the information was NOT cut by the White House
  11. Netflix reveals its 10 most popular movies, and most of them have something in common
  12. Top Lifetime Adjusted Grosses
  13. WATCH: Spirit of the Beehive - fell asleep with a vision

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
